typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SourceTableName as string ('source'),
	OldwaterMarkVal as string ('1900-01-01 00:00:00'),
	NewwaterMarkVal as string (toString(currentUTC()))
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("Select * from {$SourceTableName} where issue_d > '{$OldwaterMarkVal}' and issue_d <= '{$NewwaterMarkVal}'"),
	format: 'query') ~> SqlDb
SqlDb sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'datalake',
	folderPath: 'lc_loan',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DeltaLake
